name: Difference (invadingdingo)
description:
Difference is a psychological horror game based on the spot the difference games found in a lot of children's activity books. 

It draws heavy inspiration from some parts of Inscryption and will evolve over time into the scary game it's meant to be. 

In the demo, there are 9 differences you can look for. To play, use WASD to navigate and your mouse to click on differences. 

This is only a VERY EARLY demo, so there isn't much else to it yet. 

More to come, 

Dingo
